title: NyanDoge
author: NyanDoge
created_time: July 19, 2022, 08:43:10 PMLast edit: July 19, 2022, 09:35:39 PM by NyanDoge
content: We are proud to announce the AstroMining AirDrop & Bounty campaign!We are distributing 8.5% of ASMN tokens a total of 8,500,000,000 AstroMining Coins = $6,000,000 USDIncepted in 2018. We are back and ready for takeoff!HOW TO APPLY TO AIRDROP:Fill the form HEREPost on this thread in the following formatTelegram Username :Bitcointalk Username : Bitcointalk Profile :ERC Wallet Addres :  1,000 = $40 TOKENS PER PARTICIPANT5% OF TOKENSSpreadsheet of AirDrop Participants RULES:1. You must join our Telegram main group AstroMining2.You must join our bounty Telegram group AstroMining CoinGroup3.You must stay in both groups4.You must be active on groups5.No spamming, any troll or abuse will be tolerated6.You must not discuss Airdrop on our main group or else you will be disqualified.Campaign Period: Now until 1/1/2023We need your help!We want to hire you to get the word about out about AstroMining. We need you to make us look good by posting meaningful, relevant posts — the kind you’d make as a serious member of this forum, even if you weren’t getting paid. The kind you’d like to read.The structure of our campaign reflects our goal. We value your time and your effort and we intend to reward you accordingly. We will not reward campaign participants who make us look bad by random, meaningless posts. Participants who don’t contribute to the goal will be dismissed from the program without pay.Qualifications to participate are detailed below.General Terms:•       Stakes will be distributed on 1/1/2023 and we will update participants on totals at the end of every week.•   We reserve the right to remove you from the campaign at any time if we think you are not honest or spam the forum.•   We may not accept you in the campaign for any reason.•   If your rank changes during the campaign, you must contact the campaign manager.•   If you do not meet the minimum amount of posts, you will not receive any stake for the current week, but you will not be removed from the campaign.Social Media campaign:Rates:Based on your the amount of followers you have. For FaceBook you must either post something creative or copy a post from our Twitter or  Instagram250-499 friends/followers - 25 = $1 ASMN per share/retweet500-999 friends/followers - 75 = $3 ASMN per share/retweet1000-2499 friends/followers - 150 = $6 ASMN per share/retweet2500-4999 friends/followers - 300 = $12 ASMN per share/retweet5000+ friends/followers - 500 = $20 ASMN per share/retweetFollow our social media's - Twitter and Instagram @AstroMining Twitter InstagramRules:1. Participants must share and like AstroMiningCoin’s posts2. Accounts with fake followers will be disqualified3. Followers will NOT be updated after having registered in the campaign4. All shared articles must also be liked5. Please DO NOT post rubbish comments, it is neither necessary nor wanted6. Posts/shares must have a link to the AstroMining Coin bitcointalk post or social media AND must encompass at least 2 of these hashtags: #Crypto #Blockchain #BNB #ASMN #Ethereum #AstroMining . YOU MUST INCLUDE THESE IN YOUR shares, otherwise they won’t be counted7. Posts/shares have to be spaced at least 6 hour. Anyone breaking this rule will be banned from the bounty campaignEXAMPLE of weekly report:Code:Week #Bitcointalk username:profile link:02.30.181.2.3.02.31.181.2.3....[hr]Twitterprofile link:02.30.181.2.3.02.31.181.2.3....[hr]Instagramprofile link:02.30.181.2.3.01.31.181.2.3....*REGISTER HERE*Bitcointalk campaign:Rates:(based on your bitcointalk rank)Member - 50 = $2 ASMN per weekFull Member - 100 = $4 ASMN per weekSenior Member - 250 = $10 ASMN per weekHero member - 500 = $20 ASMN per weekLegendary member - 1000 =$40 ASMN per weekRules:Minimum 5 constructive posts per week is needed to receive TokensNot valid posts examples - "hello", "good luck", "love this project", "to the moon", etc.Restricted Discussion Boards:Politics and Society, Off-topic, Archival, Auctions and LendingA Bitcointalk account cannot have negative trust*REGISTER HERE*Content creation campaign:Spread the word with your original content and earn tokens by:-Blogging about AstroMining Coin-Promoting it in other forums, in your Facebook/LinkedIn group or any other social outlet with a large outreach-Creating YouTube videos (including interviews)Rates:(based on quality of your content)Low: 100 ASMN = $4Medium: 250 ASMN = $10High: 500 ASMN = $20Very High: 1000 ASMN = $40Rules:You can create: blog/forum posts, unique articles, videos about AstroMining Coin, social media unique posts with unique images, etc.Only original content will be acceptedQuality of your content will be decided by our team after reviewThe blog/forum must be focused on a relevant topic and must have at least 200 words for blogs or must have at least 120 words for forum posts.The article must be on a relevant website and must have at least 250 words*REGISTER HERE*Advertising:Rewards:The fee is negotiated individually.How to join:Contact me via PMTelegram campaign:Rates:50 ASMN = $4 for join;100 ASMN = $10 per week for staying active;1000 ASMN = $40  for most active participant weekly;Rules:Join our telegram channel - AstroMiningJoin our telegram Group - AstroMining GroupStay active and helpfulWrite at least one message per week for receive stakes*REGISTER HERE*
